name: In re Nomination Petition of April A. STOUDT, Candidate for Senator in the General Assembly from the 11th Senatorial District. Appeal of April A. Stoudt
name_abbreviation: In re Nomination Petition of Stoudt

judges: Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN and SAYLOR, JJ.
parties: In re Nomination Petition of April A. STOUDT, Candidate for Senator in the General Assembly from the 11th Senatorial District. Appeal of April A. Stoudt

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 24th day of March, 2000, the order of Commonwealth Court is hereby affirmed.
Justice SAYLOR dissents.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Thomas L. Wenger, Wix Wenger & Weidner, Harrisburg, for April A. Stoudt.
Richard L. Orwig, Reading, for Dominic Parish
casebody.head_matter:
746 A.2d 1117
In re Nomination Petition of April A. STOUDT, Candidate for Senator in the General Assembly from the 11th Senatorial District. Appeal of April A. Stoudt
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted March 17, 2000.
Decided March 24, 2000.
Thomas L. Wenger, Wix Wenger & Weidner, Harrisburg, for April A. Stoudt.
Richard L. Orwig, Reading, for Dominic Parish
Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN and SAYLOR, JJ.
